title: What is Computer Science?
content: In this lesson, we discuss what computer science is and why it is important.

title: Introduction to Programming
content: This lesson introduces the basics of programming using Python.

title: Understanding Arrays
content: Learn about arrays, their operations, and use cases.

title: Sorting Algorithms
content: Explore various sorting algorithms like Quick Sort and Merge Sort.

title: Introduction to Machine Learning
content: Understand what machine learning is and its applications.

title: Supervised vs Unsupervised Learning
content: Learn about the difference between supervised and unsupervised learning.
